import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import * as chartData from '../../../../shared/data/dashboard/default' @Component({ selector: 'app-recent-orders', templateUrl: './recent-orders.component.html', styleUrls: ['./recent-orders.component.scss'] }) export class RecentOrdersComponent { public recentOrders = chartData.recentOrders; public show : boolean = false constructor() { } toggle(){ this.show = !this.show } }
